name: @blocklet/co-git
description: The cooperative component library for AI Studio
author: Arcblock <blocklet@arcblock.io> https://github.com/blocklet

scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs --outDir lib/cjs && tsc --module es2022 --outDir lib/esm && tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir lib/types
scripts.build:watch: tsc --module commonjs --outDir lib/cjs -w & tsc --module es2022 --outDir lib/esm -w & tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir lib/types -w
scripts.dev: npm run storybook & npm run watch
scripts.update:deps: npx taze -n '/arcblock|ocap|abtnode|blocklet|did-connect|did-comment|nedb/' -w && npm run deduplicate && yarn
